message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer or buy it from me for $140?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you're willing to negotiate. I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $130 at this time.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do a bit better than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
I understand you're firm on the price, Alice. I'm really keen on this product, but my budget is tight.  I'm willing to go up to $135.  It's my final offer.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. How about $142.50?
